ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] In a rut at 40
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks for all the advice!  I started out in Frontier Mtns...more to just get the rythym down with minimum risk.  Except for the goblin rockcrusher (rock
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks for all the advice! I started out in Frontier Mtns...more to just
get the rythym down with minimum risk. Except for the goblin rockcrusher
(rock something...can't remember), that has a good range nuke on him...hehe.
From there, I tried in OT, with some pretty good success. Then went on a
guild trip to CoM, after which, I went to GD, and tried a frost giant.
Hehe...what a miserable failure. They *must* have a much higher MR than
most other mobs. So, since I'm there, I'm nearby for faction raids to Kael,
and will just do the bears...hopefully, they don't resist as much.

Thanks again for the advice! I haven't paid much attention to
Jonathans...then at advice given, I look...how in the hell did I overlook
that it's a 25% haste!?!?! hehe...live and learn

Thanks!!
Atonal

PS - I was in a guild group in CoM last night. Me at 40, the next lowest
was 51, and the highest a 60, and my xp bar moved like it wasn't even in a
hell level. I'll be pestering my guild to do those little raids like that
more often. :)

-----Original Message-----
From: Egelhof, Tobias [mailto:tobias.egelhof@...]
Sent: Wednesday, October 10, 2001 8:53 AM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: AW: [eqbards] In a rut at 40


do not kill frost giants, they have too many hps. go to OT and
chant-/fearkite chicken and pickles, they give good xp till 46 (got
powerlevelled through half 45 on a single evening there by a druid).

beware the sabretooth tigers though, they can be mean!

tobi

-----Urspr├╝ngliche Nachricht-----
Von: Christopher Sanders [mailto:christopher.sanders@...]
Gesendet am: Dienstag, 9. Oktober 2001 19:46
An: Eqbards (E-mail)
Betreff: [eqbards] In a rut at 40

Ok, I've been 40 for about a month now, and have 2 bubbles to go. I'm sick
of being 40!!

I'm also sick of pickup groups! Heh. So, any advice would be welcome on
where to go at this level, and what song combination to use to solo me 2
bubbles as quickly as possible.

I've been using chains-fulfils-tuyens, but it takes so long to kill a frost
giant this way...I get bored quickly (hence, 40 for a month...hehe).

Thank you!
Atonal
